content: S-AD01L(P)SS Self-drilling facade screws Stainless steel (A4) self-drilling screw without washer for profile-to-profile facade fastenings ### Categories: Home > Products > Facade mounting systems > Accessories for façade systems- - - ### FEATURES:Features Stainless steel A4 material for more corrosion-resistant fastenings Available with standard hex head or extra low height pan head for confined installation spaces Optimized design and length for profile-to-profile connections Applications For use in highly corrosive environment Fastening aluminum facade systems Profile-to-profile connections ### TECHNICAL DATA: Base materials: Aluminium Environmental Conditions: Dry indoor, Indoor environments with temporary condensation, Outdoor, rural or urban environment with low pollution, Outdoor with moderate concentration of pollution, Outdoor, areas with heavy industrial pollution, Close proximity to roads, Coastal areas Length: 1 in Technical Data | Base materials | Aluminium | Environmental Conditions | Dry indoor, Indoor environments with temporary condensation, Outdoor, rural or urban environment with low pollution, Outdoor with moderate concentration of pollution, Outdoor, areas with heavy industrial pollution, Close proximity to roads, Coastal areas | Product Class | Premium ### ITEMS- 2200902 - Self-drill screw S-AD 01 LSS 5,5x25 - Package Size 500 pc
